```py
from pycaret.datasets import get_data
```

```py
fig = px.scatter(x = data['lstat'], y = data['medv'], facet_col =
    data['rad'], opacity = 0.2, trendline = 'ols',
    trendline_color_override = 'red')
fig.show()
```

```py
    experiment_name = 'housing_prices')
```
